Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Supraventricular Arrhythmia/Ectopic Supraventricular Rhythm
Record.Description: An electrocardiographic finding of a rhythm originating at a site other than the sinoatrial node, which is also above the atrioventricular node.
